item.title: GbNRX1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GbNRX1 Gene Name: nucleoredoxin 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium barbadense Functional Descriptions: The Thioredoxin GbNRX1 Plays a Crucial Role in Homeostasis of Apoplastic Reactive Oxygen Species in Response to Verticillium dahliae Infection in Cotton.

item.title: GmGPDH12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmGPDH12 Gene Name: glycerol-3-phosphate dehydrogenase Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmGPDH12, a mitochondrial FAD-GPDH from soybean, increases salt and osmotic stress resistance by modulating redox state and respiration.
